--mbx-slider-background-light.description: Slider background when dark mode is off

--mbx-slider-background-dark.description: Slider background when dark mode is on

--mbx-slider-thumb-color-light.description: Slider thumb color when dark mode is off

--mbx-slider-thumb-color-dark.description: Slider thumb color when dark mode is on

--mbx-slider-thumb-color-hover-light.description: Slider thumb color when dark mode is off, on hover

--mbx-slider-thumb-color-hover-dark.description: Slider thumb color when dark mode is on, on hover
